aboutCohort1: The All Movies Downloader app is designed to help you easily download movies from the internet.
aboutCohort2: It’s completely free to use, and you don’t need to sign up or register.
aboutCohort3: The app has a simple and fast interface, making it easy for anyone to find and download their favorite movies.
aboutCohort4: You can choose from different download options to fit your needs, giving you more control over how you download your movies.
aboutCohort5: The app includes a forum where you can connect with other movie lovers, share ideas, and discuss your favorite films.
aboutCohort6: All Movies Downloader ensures a secure and reliable downloading process, providing you with peace of mind while accessing your favorite content.
aboutCohort7: We are constantly updating the app to provide you with the best possible experience, so be sure to check back regularly for new features and improvements.

copyRightText12: We do not claim ownership of images or data found in this app.
copyRightText13: We are committed to respecting and protecting property rights.
copyRightText14: Report any copyright infringements and we will remove them after review.
copyRightText15: We will respond to any notices of alleged infringement.
copyRightText20: To file a notice of infringement, please include the following information:
copyRightText21: 1. Title of the content being infringed.
copyRightText22: 2. Description of the infringing material and its location on our app.
copyRightText23: 3. Your contact information (name, address, email, phone number).
copyRightText24: 4. A statement that you have a good faith belief that the use of the material is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
copyRightText25: 5. A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that you are authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
copyRightText28: Our app is committed to respecting the rights of copyright holders. We do not endorse or encourage the illegal distribution of copyrighted content.
copyRightText30: We only provide access to content that is legally available and have taken steps to ensure that all sources comply with copyright laws.
copyRightText32: Users are responsible for ensuring that they do not violate copyright laws while using our app. This includes avoiding the download or distribution of pirated content.
copyRightText34: If you believe that any content available through our app infringes your copyright, please contact us immediately. We will take prompt action to address any legitimate concerns.
copyRightText36: We have a clear process in place for handling take-down requests. Upon receiving a valid request, we will promptly remove the infringing content.
copyRightText38: Our app operates in full compliance with applicable copyright laws and regulations. We are committed to cooperating with copyright holders and legal authorities.
copyRightText40: We do not tolerate the use of our app for piracy. Any users found to be engaging in illegal activities will be banned from using our app.

question1: How do I download a movie?
answer1: To download a movie, navigate to the home page, select or search for the movie of your choice. Once the details page opens, select the download options. You will see several download options. Select your choice; ADM is recommended. If you choose ADM, it will pop up and download the movie after pressing start. If you choose the browser, it will launch your default browser and then download or play the movie.
question2: How do I find my downloaded movies?
answer2: This depends on how you downloaded the movie. If you used ADM, then the movie will be found inside ADM's folder, which is located in your phone's Downloads folder. Note that it will appear as a video or folder depending on whether you used torrent or direct download. If you used a browser, you will normally see the video in your Downloads folder inside your phone. Otherwise, it's in your browser's default location for downloads.
answer3: The legality of the app depends on your country's laws regarding movie downloads. Please ensure you are complying with local regulations.
question4: Why does this app have so many ads?
answer4: Ads help us keep the app free for all users. We strive to provide a balance between user experience and the need to generate revenue to support the app.
answer5: You can contact support by navigating to the "Contact Us" section in the app menu. Fill out the form and our support team will get back to you as soon as possible.
welcomeMessage: By accessing or using our app, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms of use.
useOfAppMessage: You may use our app for lawful purposes only. You must not use the app in a way that violates any applicable local, national, or international law.
contentOwnershipMessage1: All content provided on this app is for informational purposes only. We do not host torrents or any actual files for download. We only index information from other sources, and all content remains the property of the respective owners.
copyrightPolicyMessage: We comply with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) and remove content when properly notified by the content owner, DMCA takedown notice, or their authorized agent.
